answers.answer: 12 steps gives no information at all.Changes in glasses RX are not related to optic nerves being blurred.Blurred optic nerves can be a variant of normal (psuedopapilledema) or can be due to very serious problems such as pressure in the brain.She needs to see a ophthalmologist ASAP if possible a neuroophthalmologist.JCH MD

question: My niece just received an routine eye exam...in one year her vision changed by 12 steps...and was told the the nerves in her eyes looked blurred....She is being sent to another eye doctor...What type problems will they be looking for...diabetes, etc?
title: Eye concerns
